bug.author: lygstate
bug.summary: The benchmark test of `Reduction Ops`:argMax never finished.
bug.description:
To get help from the community, check out our <denchmark-link:https://groups.google.com/a/tensorflow.org/forum/#!forum/tfjs>Google group</denchmark-link> . <denchmark-h:h4>TensorFlow.js version</denchmark-h>
Tip <denchmark-h:h4>Browser version</denchmark-h>
Chrome 68 <denchmark-h:h4>Describe the problem or feature request</denchmark-h>
Running the master/tip version of tfjs, the benchmark test of tfjs-core failed.
